_sText:
Counter-Strike: SOURCE

Fight Yard, Ruins Dawn

Based off the simple, yet symmetrical and much played map, fy_Iceworld; fy_Ruins updates the gameplay of the iceworld style map to something slightly more realistic and strategic. This version of Ruins does NOT have the secret buttons to activate the Ancient Stairway to the tops. For the Fight Yard gameplay, they have been removed to focus the fighting more on the ground level.

Other Ruins

Below will be links to other versions of the Ruins theme map. Particular the Gun Game version that adds the Ancient Stairs for access to the top pillars. fy_ruins_dawn map by nintentofu
